import Link from 'next/link' import Layout from '../../component/Layout' import { useState, useEffect, Fragment } from 'react' import { singleUser } from '../../actions/user'; import { API } from '../../config' const SingleUser = ({ user, query }) => { const showFriends = user => user.friends.map((f, i) => ( {f.firstName}{" "}{f.lastName} )) return


{user.firstName}{" "}{user.lastName}

Say Hi to Your Friends

{showFriends(user)}

People you may know

Show FOF
} SingleUser.getInitialProps = ({ query }) => { return singleUser(query.firstName).then(data => { if (data.error) { console.log(data.error) } else { return { user: data, query } } }) } export default SingleUser;
